string-array.name: gps_entries
string-array.item: 50 meters (more accurate, but higher battery usage)

string-array.name: intro_details
string-array.item: MiTravels is your personal diary that helps you document and relive special journeys that you create in your life path
Start by creating a Journey with MiTravel. This will help you to organise each journey that you embark on can, and remember your special times in your life Travels.
Once you have a created a new journey, you can add Journal entries for that journey, and document your activities and feelings.
Add photos to your journal entries to bring each journal entry to life and enhance the memories of those experiences.
Relive each Journey by following your journey through our interactive map together and revisit your experiences.
